scripts.copy-to-client: cp e2e-test/soia.h client && cp e2e-test/soia.cc client && cp e2e-test/soia.testing.h client
scripts.copy-to-client:check: diff -s e2e-test/soia.h client/soia.h && diff -s e2e-test/soia.cc client/soia.cc && diff -s e2e-test/soia.testing.h client/soia.testing.h
scripts.format: prettier --write "**/*.ts" && npm run format-soia && npm run format-cc
scripts.format:check: prettier --check "**/*.ts" && npm run format-soia:check && npm run format-cc:check
scripts.test-cc: cd e2e-test && CC=clang BAZEL_COMPILER=llvm bazel test --copt=-DADDRESS_SANITIZER --copt=-fsanitize=address --linkopt=-fsanitize=address --test_output=errors :all && cd ..
scripts.build-client: cd client && bazel build :soia && bazel build :soia.testing && cd ..
scripts.test: npm run build && soiac --root=e2e-test && npm run test-cc && npm run build-client
